name: Legend of the Unicorn King
description:
Wrought from a child's imagination, the Legend of the Unicorn King explores the magical region of Under Bed.  Our Unicorn King has to avoid many enemies and obstacles as he traverses his kingdom.

For the 2021 Flair Fair. 

HTML 5 version: https://stellarfelines.itch.io/legend-of-the-unicorn-king-html5

Team entry:
NebNova - Programming
Jen - Art/Animations
Davey347 - Sound Effects/Art
Lova - Music/Sound Effects
Polymorphic - Programming
